rules_text: [+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one on the bottom of your library.
special_text:
[+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one on the bottom of your library.
[0]: Exile another target permanent you own. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next end step.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “Hexproof, you and your creatures have.”
